snippet: A coalition of religious and human rights leaders demanded the aid for girls and women raped by fighters for groups like the Islamic State and Boko Haram.
abstract: Coalition of religious and human rights leaders demand that Pres Obama support abortion financing for women raped in overseas conflicts involving terrorist groups like the Islamic State and Boko Haram; group, who have rolled out stark advertising campaign on issue, say Obama has spoken compassionately on issue while doing little.
lead_paragraph: A coalition of religious and human rights leaders demanded the aid for girls and women raped by fighters for groups like the Islamic State and Boko Haram.

headline.main: Religious Leaders Urge U.S. to Fund Abortions for Rape Victims in Conflicts Abroad
headline.print_headline: Religious Coalition Wants U.S. to Pay for Abortions for Terrorist Rape Victims

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: United States Agency for International Development
